message.content:
To copy the contents of a specific cell while removing all single quotes in LibreOffice Calc, you can use the following formula:

`=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")`

In this formula:
- `A1` is the reference to the cell from which you want to copy the contents.
- `SUBSTITUTE` function replaces all occurrences of the first argument (single quote in this case) with the second argument (nothing or empty string in this case).

This formula removes single quotes while maintaining the rest of the content in the cell. Replace `A1` with your desired cell reference to use this formula in your spreadsheet.
